title: [Puppeth] Explorer doesn't work
body:
Looks like Explorer setup with Puppeth doesn't work.

#### System information

Geth version: 1.8.1
OS & Version: Ubuntu 16.04

#### Expected behaviour

Explorer successfully launches.

#### Actual behaviour

Explorer throws an error:
```
[PM2] Spawning PM2 daemon with pm2_home=/root/.pm2
[PM2] PM2 Successfully daemonized
[PM2][WARN] Applications node-app not running, starting...
[PM2] App [node-app] launched (1 instances)
┌──────────┬────┬──────┬─────┬────────┬─────────┬────────┬─────┬───────────┬──────┬──────────┐
│ App name │ id │ mode │ pid │ status │ restart │ uptime │ cpu │ mem       │ user │ watching │
├──────────┼────┼──────┼─────┼────────┼─────────┼────────┼─────┼───────────┼──────┼──────────┤
│ node-app │ 0  │ fork │ 21  │ online │ 0       │ 0s     │ 2%  │ 23.0 MB   │ root │ disabled │
└──────────┴────┴──────┴─────┴────────┴─────────┴────────┴─────┴───────────┴──────┴──────────┘
 Use `pm2 show <id|name>` to get more details about an app
Spec json is invalid: missing field `gasLimitBoundDivisor` at line 34 column 3
```

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

Launch Explorer with Puppeth.

#### Backtrace

````
[PM2] Spawning PM2 daemon with pm2_home=/root/.pm2
[PM2] PM2 Successfully daemonized
[PM2][WARN] Applications node-app not running, starting...
[PM2] App [node-app] launched (1 instances)
┌──────────┬────┬──────┬─────┬────────┬─────────┬────────┬─────┬───────────┬──────┬──────────┐
│ App name │ id │ mode │ pid │ status │ restart │ uptime │ cpu │ mem       │ user │ watching │
├──────────┼────┼──────┼─────┼────────┼─────────┼────────┼─────┼───────────┼──────┼──────────┤
│ node-app │ 0  │ fork │ 21  │ online │ 0       │ 0s     │ 2%  │ 23.0 MB   │ root │ disabled │
└──────────┴────┴──────┴─────┴────────┴─────────┴────────┴─────┴───────────┴──────┴──────────┘
 Use `pm2 show <id|name>` to get more details about an app
Spec json is invalid: missing field `gasLimitBoundDivisor` at line 34 column 3

````
